Public Graphs

# Learn about API authentication here: /python/getting-started
# Find your api_key here: /settings/api

import plotly.plotly as py
from plotly.graph_objs import *

data = Data([
    Scatter(
        x=[0, 2, 4],
        y=[0, 4, 2]
    )
])
plot_url = py.plot(data, filename='privacy-true', world_readable=True)

Private Graphs

# Learn about API authentication here: /python/getting-started
# Find your api_key here: /settings/api

import plotly.plotly as py
from plotly.graph_objs import *

data = Data([
    Scatter(
        x=[0, 2, 4],
        y=[0, 4, 2]
    )
])
plot_url = py.plot(data, filename='privacy-false', world_readable=False)
Plotly

Plotly is the easiest and fastest way to graph and share your data online.
